price: 39. ¡Pueblo mío!, esta vida terrenal no es más que un placer pasajero, mientras que la otra vida es la morada permanente.
arabic: يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنَّمَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا مَتَٰعٞ وَإِنَّ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ هِيَ دَارُ ٱلۡقَرَارِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: yāqawmi innamā hādhihi al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā matāʿun wa-inna al-ākhirata hiya dāru al-qarāri
